statements: DELETE FROM contestant_profiles WHERE contestant_id = 1 AND contestant_name = 'Alice'
DELETE FROM judging_scores WHERE judge_id = 5 AND taste_score < 5;
DELETE FROM judging_scores WHERE taste_score < 5 AND episode_id = 1;
